channel.title: jazzy-hip-hop on Jesse Ward
channel.description: Recent content in jazzy-hip-hop on Jesse Ward

item.title: The Sofa Sessions I
item.description: The Sofa Sessions mix series focuses on the soulful side of electronic music. The series features styles ranging from Acid Jazz, Downtempo, Drum and Bass, Hip-Hop and Trip-Hop. Music with soul, music to lounge to. Volume I - Nod your head, tap your feet.. Easy listening for a lazy sunny Sunday afternoon. A mix of downtempo and jazzy hip-hop, inspired by the Mushroom Jazz mix series.
